document_data.mainbody:
he Feast of the Silver Coin was a religious celebration observed by worshipers of Nephthys, the Guardian of Wealth and Commerce within the Mulhorandi pantheon. The same holy day was known elsewhere in Faer√ªn as the Feast of the Moon.
During the Feast of the Silver Coin, priestesses of Nephthys celebrated a somber day-long event where they gave thanks to their goddess and tithed half of their wealth at days end.
